name: sbidd-misc
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wi(w0, wsb(s0, s0, w1)), wi(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wi(w0, wsb(s0, s0, w1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s0, w1), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wi(w0, wsb(s0, s0, w1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s0, w1), w1)
|- wb(wi(w0, wsb(s0, s0, w1)), wi(w0, w1))

comment: An identity theorem for substitution. See ~ sbid . See Remark 9.1 in [Megill] p. 447 (p. 15 of the preprint). (Contributed by DAW, 18-Feb-2017.)
